title: Settings
languageDesc: Select the language for the user interface
themeDesc: Changes both UI and terminal appearance
scrollbackLinesDesc: Number of lines to keep in terminal buffer (ring buffer). Higher values use more memory. Recommended: 2000-10000 for multiple concurrent sessions.
fontSizeDesc: Terminal font size in pixels. Range: 8-32px. Changes apply to all terminals.
terminalFontFamilyDesc: Terminal font family. Changes apply to all terminals. Requires page refresh for some fonts.
uiFontFamilyDesc: UI font family for menus, buttons, and other interface elements. Changes apply immediately.
saveConnectionHistoryDesc: Automatically save recent connections for quick access
reconnectRetryDesc: Automatically retry connection when reconnecting (useful after reboot)
reconnectIntervalDesc: Time to wait between retry attempts (default: 1000ms)
enableAIDesc: Convert natural language to shell commands using LLM
providerDesc: LLM provider. Ollama runs locally, others require API keys.
apiKeyDesc: API key for {{provider}}. Keep this secure.
baseURLDesc: API endpoint URL. For Ollama, default is http://localhost:11434
modelDesc: Model name to use for the selected provider.
modelDescOllama: Model name to use. Available models loaded from Ollama. Use arrow keys to navigate.
modelDescOllamaLoading: Type model name or wait for available models to load.
temperatureDesc: Controls randomness (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very creative). Recommended: 0.7
maxTokensDesc: Maximum tokens in response. Higher values allow longer commands but cost more.
appDescription: A modern SSH and Serial terminal client
